Title: Suspicious Minds
Description:
For many years, the only non-Arathi we ever saw in Hallowfall were trying to kill us. Nerubians, shadow creatures, beasts. So, forgive me if I view your sudden arrival with suspicion.

However, my better half would urge me to be more welcoming... and I want to try to be better. For her.

Some of the salamanthers in Rumshackle have been bothering us. Kill them and bring me proof.
